üèù 6 Week Workshop on Deep Learning

A six-week hands-on machine learning workshop for programmers and data scientists wanting to break into the AI industry.

Over 6 weeks, with 3 contact hours per week, you will get to grips with using Python, TensorFlow and Google Colaboratory. Our experienced instructors will work closely to support you to build your own deep learning models that solve problems across typical domains of deep learning. The workshop series focuses on foundations, embeddings, and computer vision.

In order to support learning and development, we provide "office hours", twice per week, for a total of 2 hours, to allow for a supportive environment to complete assigned homework and gain further understanding.
